blogPost.title: Muhammad bin Salman has cemented a reputation as a vicious, impulsive ruler. The CIA report appears to confirm that view https://t.co/0xm73eWUli
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼已经巩固了一个恶毒、冲动的统治者的名声。中情局的报告似乎证实了这一观点https://t.co/0xm73eWUli。
穆罕默德-本-薩勒曼已經鞏固了一個惡毒、衝動的統治者的名聲。中情局的報告似乎證實了這一觀點https://t.co/0xm73eWUli。

previous.title:
“Whale calls or other mammal calls in the ocean may contain more information than we thought.” Václav Kuna, a seismologist at @OSUCEOAS, tells @kncukier how singing whales could help the study of the sea floor on "Babbage"
 https://t.co/51V98dBZeA https://t.co/YBeQBzSang

localize.full_text:
"鲸鱼的叫声或海洋中其他哺乳动物的叫声可能包含的信息比我们想象的要多。" @OSUCEOAS的地震学家Václav Kuna告诉@kncukier 唱歌的鲸鱼如何帮助研究 "巴贝奇 "的海底。
 https://t.co/51V98dBZeA https://t.co/YBeQBzSang

"鯨魚的叫聲或海洋中其他哺乳動物的叫聲可能包含的信息比我們想象的要多。" @OSUCEOAS的地震學家Václav Kuna告訴@kncukier 唱歌的鯨魚如何幫助研究 "巴貝奇 "的海底。
 https://t.co/51V98dBZeA https://t.co/YBeQBzSang

next.title: Credible reports of atrocities and war crimes are emerging in Tigray. Many involve troops from neighbouring Eritrea, who are fighting alongside Ethiopian forces  https://t.co/tuHRUmg7xJ

localize.full_text: 关于提格雷的暴行和战争罪的可信报告正在出现。其中许多涉及来自邻国厄立特里亚的部队，他们与埃塞俄比亚部队并肩作战https://t.co/tuHRUmg7xJ。
關於提格雷的暴行和戰爭罪的可信報告正在出現。其中許多涉及來自鄰國厄立特里亞的部隊，他們與埃塞俄比亞部隊並肩作戰https://t.co/tuHRUmg7xJ。
